snippet: Mr. Jamison’s exhibition at the Miguel Abreu Gallery considers the disruption of conventional systems.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit of works by multi-media artist Aaron Flint Jamison at Miguel Abreu Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Jamison’s exhibition at the Miguel Abreu Gallery considers the disruption of conventional systems.

headline.main: Review: Aaron Flint Jamison’s Craft of Technology
headline.print_headline: Review: Aaron Flint Jamison’s Craft of Technology
